title: [K-12] Web-Based Neuroanatomy Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic anatomy and neurophysiology knowledge
context.additional_context: Development of competencies in analyzing and utilizing practical neuroanatomy web resources

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and explain neuroanatomical structures using 3D web-based simulation tools.
Learners can apply the functional connectivity of spinal pathways to clinical cases using web-based visualization tools.
Learners can analyze and compare the pedagogical utility of neuroanatomy web resources based on assessment rubrics.

resources: Subscription to a specialized neuroanatomy web platform

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
